title: Establishment of Wild Elephant Holding Grounds to Minimize Damages Caused by Wild Elephants
decision_details: - the proposal to establish two Wild Elephant Holding Grounds at Horowpathana and Lunugamwehera, in the first instance, with funds to be provided under the Medium Term Budgetary Frame Work 2013 - 2015, to minimize human  elephant conflict, was approved by the Cabinet.
